name: Ciga Game Jam 2022 Cat's Fist
description:
It is a game demo made under 48 hours in CIGA Game Jam. The game is about guessing the rock paper Scissors in normal or reversed ways. Each time you got the answer wrong there will be one floor removed and when you lose all the floor the game is over. 

The team members  in this game demo are: Miaosen.Li(game design,3D enviroment modeling), Zixuan Shi (UI programming), RockeyC (Gameplay programming), ZiChen Xu(3D enviroment modeling),Yindi Liu(UI and character modeling). 644(3D enviroment modeling),Miyue(Animation),XHR(QA and feedbacks)
